comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Kliment Effimov Boyadzhiev (aka Bojadieff / Bojadjew / Bojadziev), Bulgarian General, in November 1915 he defeated the Serbian troops and entered Niš, see trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/72099306 See also en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kliment_Boyadzhiev www.macedonians.com.au/forum/showthread.php/11659-Fyromia... www.huesken.com/shop/de/autographen-i-weltkrieg-1914-1918...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you for this additional information B-59, we'll fill in his name the next time that we update the record.
